item.title: ACSS Surveillance Processor (STC ST02053LA) – Link and Display Processor Unit (LDPU) GPS Source (EFB Installed)

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided Automatic Dependent Surveillance-Broadcast (ADS-B) Functionality is considered inoperative.

note.para: Additional deferral required – ACSS Surveillance Processor (STC ST02053LA) – Automatic Dependent Surveillance-Broadcast (ADS-B) Functionality (EFB Installed).

numlitem.para: Merging & Spacing and CAVS operations are prohibited.

placard.para: Placard next to upper EICAS screen "LINK AND DISPLAY PROCESSOR UNIT (LDPU) INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
